name: Topiramate

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications.text: topiramate indicated : epilepsy : initial monotherapy treatment partial-onset primary generalized tonic-clonic seizures patients 2 years age older ( 1.1 ) ; adjunctive therapy treatment partial-onset seizures , primary generalized tonic-clonic seizures , seizures associated lennox- gastaut syndrome patients 2 years age older ( 1.2 ) preventive treatment migraine patients 12 years age older ( 1.3 )

contraindications.text: topiramate initial dose , titration , recommended maintenance dose varies indication age group . full prescribing information recommended , dosing considerations patients renal impairment , geriatric patients , patients undergoing hemodialysis ( 2.1 , 2.2 , 2.3 , 2.4 , 2.5 , 2.6 )

warningsAndPrecautions: topiramate tablets , usp available debossed , film-coated , circular tablets following strengths colors : 25 mg white ( coded “ ” one side ; “ 707 ” ) ndc : 70518-0887-00 packaging : 30 1 blister pack store topiramate tablets 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect moisture . dispense tight container . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
indications_original: Topiramate is indicated for: Epilepsy: initial monotherapy for the treatment of partial-onset or primary generalized tonic-clonic seizures in patients 2 years of age and older (1.1); adjunctive therapy for the treatment of partial-onset seizures, primary generalized tonic-clonic seizures, or seizures associated with Lennox- Gastaut syndrome in patients 2 years of age and older (1.2) Preventive treatment of migraine in patients 12 years of age and older (1.3)
contraindications_original: Topiramate initial dose, titration, and recommended maintenance dose varies by indication and age group. See Full Prescribing Information for recommended dosage, and dosing considerations in patients with renal impairment, geriatric patients, and patients undergoing hemodialysis (2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 2.4, 2.5, 2.6)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Topiramate tablets, USP are available as debossed, film-coated, circular tablets in the following strengths and colors:
                  
                  25 mg white (coded “S” on one side; “707” on the other)
                  NDC: 70518-0887-00
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  
                  Store topiramate tablets at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Protect from moisture. Dispense in a tight container.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
